name: Shadow Deflect
description:
This game was made in the Community Game Jam 2019 with the theme: The game is a liar

You get to play as Kris, who is a lone wanderer and is still haunted by her dark past. She then decided to confront her shadow to erase all the regrets she has once and for all.

the enemies shoot instead of the player, use the pillars and walls to kill them!

Controls:

Keyboard: 

  • W,A,S,D to move
  • R to restart
  • SPACE to shoot

Controller:

  • LS to move
  • X to restart
  • RT to shoot

created by Nikolas Abraham and  Jason XXR
